constantValues: Formal offer for products and/or services, proposed at specific prices and related payment terms, which is sent to a prospective customer.

definitions.description: Formal offer for products and/or services, proposed at specific prices and related payment terms, which is sent to a prospective customer.

members.name: quoteId
members.description: Unique identifier of the quote.

members.name: emailAddress

constantValues: The primary email address for the entity.

members.description: The primary email address for the entity.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive name for the quote.

members.description: Type a descriptive name for the quote.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: billToAddressId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the billing address.

members.description: Unique identifier of the billing address.

members.name: billToCity

constantValues: Type the city for the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the city for the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToComposite

constantValues: Shows the complete Bill To address.

members.description: Shows the complete Bill To address.

members.name: billToContactName

constantValues: Type the primary contact name at the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the primary contact name at the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToCountry

constantValues: Type the country or region for the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the country or region for the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToFax

constantValues: Type the fax number for the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the fax number for the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToLine1

constantValues: Type the first line of the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the first line of the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToLine2

constantValues: Type the second line of the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the second line of the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToLine3

constantValues: Type the third line of the billing address.

members.description: Type the third line of the billing address.

members.name: billToName

constantValues: Type a name for the customer's billing address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office", to identify the address.

members.description: Type a name for the customer's billing address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office", to identify the address.

members.name: billToPostalCode

constantValues: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the billing address.

members.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the billing address.

members.name: billToStateOrProvince

constantValues: Type the state or province for the billing address.

members.description: Type the state or province for the billing address.

members.name: billToTelephone

constantValues: Type the phone number for the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the phone number for the customer's billing address.

members.name: closedOn

constantValues: Enter the date when the quote was closed to indicate the expiration, revision, or cancellation date.

members.description: Enter the date when the quote was closed to indicate the expiration, revision, or cancellation date.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the quote, such as the products or services offered or details about the customer's product preferences.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the quote, such as the products or services offered or details about the customer's product preferences.

members.name: discountAmount

constantValues: Type the discount amount for the quote if the customer is eligible for special savings.

members.description: Type the discount amount for the quote if the customer is eligible for special savings.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: discountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Quote Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Quote Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: discountPercentage

constantValues: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Detail Amount field to include additional savings for the customer in the quote.

members.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Detail Amount field to include additional savings for the customer in the quote.

members.name: effectiveFrom

constantValues: Enter the date when the quote pricing is effective or was first communicated to the customer.

members.description: Enter the date when the quote pricing is effective or was first communicated to the customer.

members.name: effectiveTo

constantValues: Enter the expiration date or last day the quote pricing is effective for the customer.

members.description: Enter the expiration date or last day the quote pricing is effective for the customer.

members.name: expiresOn

constantValues: Enter the date a decision or order is due from the customer to indicate the expiration date of the quote.

members.description: Enter the date a decision or order is due from the customer to indicate the expiration date of the quote.

members.name: freightAmount

constantValues: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the quote for use in calculating the Total Amount field.

members.description: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the quote for use in calculating the Total Amount field.

members.name: freightAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Select the quote's status.

members.name: totalAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the quote.

members.name: totalAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreight

constantValues: Shows the total product amount for the quote, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total product amount for the quote, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the quote.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the quote.

members.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the quote.

members.name: totalDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemAmount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the quote, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the quote, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.name: totalLineItemAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the quote. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the quote and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the quote

members.description: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the quote. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the quote and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the quote

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalTax

constantValues: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the quote, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the quote, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the quote.

members.name: totalTaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.name: willCall

constantValues: Select whether the products included in the quote should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

members.description: Select whether the products included in the quote should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows the duration in minutes for which the quote was on hold.

members.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the quote was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.
